plot: Shortly before his death, Bolivian poet and architect Primo Castrillo remembers his origin is in rural Bolivia, his work as an architect in the US and how he became a poet by the age of 55.
title: Primo Castrillo, poeta
plot_es: Shortly before his death, Bolivian poet and architect Primo Castrillo remembers his origin is in rural Bolivia, his work as an architect in the US and how he became a poet by the age of 55.
plot_en: Shortly before his death, Bolivian poet and architect Primo Castrillo remembers his origin is in rural Bolivia, his work as an architect in the US and how he became a poet by the age of 55.
